mapper.sql: ACTIVITY_ID, FEE_ID, CREATE_TIME, FEE_NAME, FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CREATOR, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME,CREATOR_ID
mapper.insert: insert into TOM_ACTIVITY_FEES (ACTIVITY_ID, CREATE_TIME, FEE_NAME, FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CREATOR, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TOM_ACTIVITY_FEES
ACTIVITY_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
FEE_NAME,
FEE,
REMARK,
STATUS,
CREATOR,
OPERATOR,
UPDATE_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
#{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select:
select
from TOM_ACTIVITY_FEES where ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and STATUS='Y'

SELECT count(*) from TOM_ACTIVITY_FEES WHERE STATUS ='Y'
AND ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT s.ACTIVITY_ID AS activityId, s.FEE_NAME AS feeName, s.FEE AS fee FROM TOM_ACTIVITY_FEES s WHERE STATUS ='Y'
AND ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by s.FEE desc limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
